nodes.title: Allow the legacy character to be specified in LegacyComponent
Add compatibility with older Guava versions
api: Allow TranslatableComponent builder to use empty keys
Use TextComponent instead of Component in LegacyComponentSerializer
api: Extract title times to separate class to allow easily re-using
text-serializer-gson: Ensure GsonComponentSerializer#toBuilder() carries over legacy hover event serializer configuration
api: titles can be in ticks, not just a Duration
nbt: Corrently handle other empty tag types
api: Fix rendering args and children of an unknown translatable component
Add replace(n) and replaceFirst methods to TextComponent
Don't use streams when checking validity of namespace and value
Fix regression in #82 with a single chat component from the main logic loop
Correctly handle resets followed by more styling
Extract BlockNBTComponent position parsing from gson serializer
plain: Use static getter rather than field access to get instance
A few tweaks to the SNBT reader + writer
Improve performance of BinaryTagIO by buffering and clarify stream closing
Boss bar equality based on object identity
Finish Audience documentation, solidify the interface
Separate BossBar update logic from the API
Split up Audience into different functionality types
Adjust nbt library packaging to not include impl
Add TextColor#fromCSSHexString() for CSS RGB colors
Allow deserializing the legacy RGB format used by BungeeCord
Fix nbt array reading with prefixed indexes
Add support for serializing to bungeecord-chat's legacy hex format
serializer-legacy: Add option to downsample text colors when using legacy format
Use builder pattern for legacy serializer and add support for hex colors
Add methods to get the individual components of a text color
Add support for different style merge strategies
some ideas, not sure how i feel about them yet
allow configuring component style during build via a consumer
Allow poping commands when the "1/5" like page index is clicked
Add support for detecting and linking to URLs in the legacy serializer
Fix legacy serializer when text changes from reset to a color (fixes #17)
Merge plain component serializer into 1.11 branch
Fix handling of &r in the legacy component deserializer
Add methods to perform modifications to child components recursively
api: Add methods to join components using a collector
api: Add a method to create a TextColor from an HSVLike
api: Add Keyed overloads to hover event types
Added ZLIB compression support for NBT
few fixes, see commits for details
api: Add asHSV to RGBLike and use HSV for color comparisons in NamedTextColor.nearestTo
text-serializer-legacy: Vanilla implementation for URL conversion
feature(nbt): allow merging compound tags via 'this.put(that)'
api: add support for pixel width calculation
serializer-gson: Change output ordering to match the order of Vanilla components
Include empty components in translatable arguments
serializer-configurate*: Fix handling of string component output
nbt: Introduce a new way to read and write binary tags, with support for (legacy) named roots.
nbt: ability to add multiple tags to a Compound tag
api: Correct handling of children in some text replacements
api: Add 'Builder' suffix to Component factory methods that return a builder
Add JetBrains Contract annotations to some methods
build: Add a bom for version alignment across submodules
text-serializer-legacy: allow specifying custom url pattern
api: Add a builder for replacement config
api: Fix handling of first replacements in child components
Add a check for null nbt data on item hovers
nbt: Add array access and stream methods for tags
Fix translatable component rendering bug with nested children
api: add ability to parse a Locale
text-serializer-legacy: don't rely on order always being the same
Improve the way global translations are managed
api: allow replaceText to return anything ComponentLike
Add Non-Regex, Non-Lambda overloads for replace methods
api: Improve ability to statically import factory methods
bump build, move to new readme
renderer: Fix merging of fonts and insertions
api: add audience that wraps a collection
Fix reading of trailing comma in nbt list/array/compound
api: Add inVersion to all @ApiStatus.ScheduledForRemoval annotations
api: Don't override Pointered methods that just delegate
api: Be more strict about validating nullness of appended components
api: Remove useless empty root components when compacting
text-serializer-legacy: Expose LegacyFormat in a more useful way
Added common abstraction between JSON serializers
move leftover checker-qual annotations to jetbrains
api: Merge style of full match when replaced
api: Make sure pointers() is overridden in ForwardingAudience.Single
Make Gradle automatically copy JD to the appropriate location for JD repo
build: Apply contract-validator to ensure contract annotations are syntactically valid
build: Migrate build scripts to Kotlin DSL
api: Add Pointer query to Single
Remove checker qual and migrate to jetbrains annotations
Add missing package-info and relevant checkstyle rule
feat(api/text) #378: ability to unset decorations during component construction
Migrate remaining text-serializer-gson serializers to use `TypeAdapter`s
api: Add contains method that allows alternative methods of equality comparison
api: Make contains check for entity name
Added more extensions and enabled explicit API
text-serializer-legacy: Properly passthrough invalid RGB codes
api: Allow passing the replacement MatchResult to continuation predicates
api: More ways to stop sound
api: Expose ComponentLike -> Component conversion method
api: Ensure that forwarding audiences override the appropriate methods
api: Add a way to play a sound from a coordinate
api: Add support for playing sound with an "emitter"
build: Add extra metadata to jar manifests
api: Add serializer methods that will process null values
Fixed typo in documentation in Title
api: Introduce new concept of a component flattener
api: Mark ScoreComponent's value as deprecated since it is no longer supported
api: Nag when somebody does something naughty
serializer-gson: Add deserializers for JsonElement, Reader and JsonReader
